ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Gordon on xp
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hard to discuss exp changes if you haven t read the producer s letter. ;-) http://everquest.station.sony.com/news/letter.shtml ... Droga increased by 12%
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:11 PM 1/19/01 -0500, Matt DeBarger wrote:
>Oh I thought the biggest bump was 20%, I don't mean total (since that does
>not affect the % increase). Which dungeon got more than a 20% bump?
>
>Heh, in Karnors we weren't fear kiting, just killing them , spreading the
>damage amongst all 6 of us, while I sung double regen and haste with
>mandolin...

Hard to discuss exp changes if you haven't read the producer's letter. ;-)

http://everquest.station.sony.com/news/letter.shtml

Dungeon increases:
-------------------------------------
Droga increased by 12%
Nurga increased by 12%
Solusek's Eye (SolA) increased by 13%
Najena increased by 13%
Befallen increased by 13%
Paw increased by 13%
Permafrost increased by 13%
Kaesora increased by 18%
Qeynos Catacombs increased by 20%
Runnyeye increased by 20%
Kerra Ridge increased by 20%
The Hole increased by 25%
Uppger Guk increased by about 12% (from patch news)

Group increases:
---------------------------
2 person group - 2% total bonus.
3 person group - 6% total bonus.
4 person group - 10% total bonus.
5 person group - 14% total bonus.
6 person group - 20% total bonus.
